CustomField.formula: TEXT(FLOOR((IF(ISBLANK(End_Date__c), TODAY(), End_Date__c) - Start_Date__c)/365)) & ' years, ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((IF(ISBLANK(End_Date__c), TODAY(), End_Date__c) - Start_Date__c),365)/30)) & ' months, ' & TEXT(MOD(MOD((IF(ISBLANK(End_Date__c), TODAY(), End_Date__c) - Start_Date__c),365),30)) & ' days'
CustomField.label: Total Exposure Length
